thread.title: Lakeview girls soccer team named 2014-15 NSCAA team academic award recipient
thread.title_full: Lakeview girls soccer team named 2014-15 NSCAA team academic award recipient

author: AccessWDUN Staff
title: Lakeview girls soccer team named 2014-15 NSCAA team academic award recipient
text:
By AccessWDUN Staff Related Articles Four Spartans soccer standouts sign to play for Andrew College 8- coach of year Wade leaving GHS girls soccer for Lumpkin boys Soccer: Region 8- coaches honor All-Region selections Soccer: 8-AAAA coaches name All-Region team, honors 
GAINESVILLE – The Lakeview Academy girls soccer team was recognized by the National Soccer Coaches Association of America (NSCAA) with the 2014-15 High School Team Academic Award. 
The NSCAA annually recognizes high school soccer programs that have excelled in the classroom, in addition to their performance on the field. 
The Lady Lions soccer team was one of 398 teams (150 boys, 248 girls) nationwide recognized for exemplary performance in the classroom as a team during the 2014-15 academic year. Among these programs are 51 schools receiving honors for both their boys’ and girls’ teams. 
You can find the full list of 2014-15 NSCAA Team Academic Award recipients by clicking here . 
To qualify for this award, the team must have a minimum grade point average of 3.25 for the entire academic year. The team GPA is determined by adding every player's GPA, then dividing by the number of players. Associated Tags : High school soccer, Lakeview girls soccer © Copyright 2015 AccessWDUN.com
